item.title: This American R
item.description: library(tidyverse) tal <- read_csv("~/Documents/HKS/rtutorial/data/this_american_life/tal_complete.csv") tal1 <- tal %>% slice(1) tal1 %>% select(content) %>% mutate(content = str_replace_all(content, "\\n|\\\n", " ") %>% str_trim(.,"both")) ## # A tibble: 1 x 1 ## content ## <chr> ## 1 "1: New Beginnings Transcript Originally aired 11.17.1995 Note: This Americ… tal_tidy <- tal %>% slice(1:100) %>% tidytext::unnest_tokens("word", content) %>% mutate(title = str_replace_all(title, "\\\n", " ") %>% str_replace(., "Transcript.+Originally aired.+", "")) %>% anti_join(tidytext::stop_words) tal_tf_idf <- tal_tidy %>% select(title, word) %>% group_by(title) %>% count(word, sort = TRUE) %>% ungroup() %>% tidytext::bind_tf_idf(word, title, n) tal_tf_idf %>% group_by(title) %>% arrange(-tf_idf) %>% slice(1:10) %>% summarise(top_words = str_c(word, collapse = ", ")) %>% ungroup() %>% left_join(tal_tidy %>% distinct(title, air_date, show_number)) %>% arrange(air_date) %>% mutate(title_words = str_c(title, top_words, sep = ": ")) %>% ggplot() + geom_text(aes(-show_number, 0, label = title_words), size = 5) + # scale_x_date(date_labels = "%y-%m-%d") + theme(axis.

item.title: Exploring Euro Ship Data
item.description: ##Add text here library(tidyverse) library(readxl) library(ggridges) library(patchwork) z <- readxl::read_excel("~/Downloads/2018-v151-08022020-EU MRV Publication of information.xlsx", skip = 2) ##Add text here z_t <- z %>% set_names(., names(.) %>% str_to_lower() %>% str_replace_all(., " ", "_") %>% str_replace_all(., "\\[|\\]|\\(|\\)|", "") %>% str_replace_all(., "\\/", "per")) %>% select(imo_number, ship_type, annual_total_time_spent_at_sea_hours, fuel_consumptions_assigned_to_on_laden_m_tonnes, annual_average_fuel_consumption_per_distance_kg_per_n_mile, total_fuel_consumption_m_tonnes, everything()) %>% mutate_at(vars(-ship_type), as.numeric) z_t %>% group_by(ship_type) %>% summarise(total_fuel_consumption_m_tonnes = sum(total_fuel_consumption_m_tonnes/365/1000*6.6, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% ggplot() + geom_col(aes(fct_reorder(ship_type, total_fuel_consumption_m_tonnes), total_fuel_consumption_m_tonnes)) + coord_flip() ##Add text here
